mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCH_SALE ( CNO, ORDER_CNO, SALEDATE, ORI_250, ORI_500, ORI_1000, ERL_250, ERL_500, ERL_1000, STC_250, STC_500, STC_1000, GUBUN, PRICE, PAYMENTPATH, SALEPATH, DELEVERYDATE, DELEVERYPATH, ORDERER, ORDERDATE, COMM, MANAGER, GUBUNCODE, STATUS, FLAG ) VALUES ( PURCHSALE_PK.NEXTVAL, #{order_cno}, #{saleDate}, #{ori_250}, #{ori_500}, #{ori_1000}, #{erl_250}, #{erl_500}, #{erl_1000}, #{stc_250}, #{stc_500}, #{stc_1000}, #{gubun}, #{price}, #{paymentPath}, #{salePath}, TO_DATE(#{deleveryDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{deleveryPath}, #{orderer}, TO_DATE(#{orderDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{comm}, #{manager}, #{gubunCode}, 'sale', 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, CNO, ORDER_CNO, SALEDATE, ORI_250, ORI_500, ORI_1000, ERL_250, ERL_500, ERL_1000, STC_250, STC_500, STC_1000, GUBUN, PRICE, PAYMENTPATH, SALEPATH, DELEVERYDATE, DELEVERYPATH, ORDERER, ORDERDATE, COMM, MANAGER, GUBUNCODE, STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, CNO, ORDER_CNO, SALEDATE, ORI_250, ORI_500, ORI_1000, ERL_250, ERL_500, ERL_1000, STC_250, STC_500, STC_1000, GUBUN, PRICE, PAYMENTPATH, SALEPATH, DELEVERYDATE, DELEVERYPATH, ORDERER, ORDERDATE, COMM, MANAGER, GUBUNCODE, STATUS FROM ( SELECT CNO, ORDER_CNO, SALEDATE, ORI_250, ORI_500, ORI_1000, ERL_250, ERL_500, ERL_1000, STC_250, STC_500, STC_1000, GUBUN, PRICE, PAYMENTPATH, SALEPATH, TO_CHAR(DELEVERYDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') DELEVERYDATE, DELEVERYPATH, ORDERER, TO_CHAR(ORDERDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ORDERDATE, COMM, MANAGER, GUBUNCODE, STATUS, RDATE FROM PURCH_SALE WHERE STATUS = 'sale' AND FLAG != 4 ORDER BY SALEDATE DESC, RDATE DESC ) ) WHERE 1=1 AND RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.SUNDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD (DY)','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') startDate, TO_CHAR(A.SATURDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD (DY)','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') endDate, TO_CHAR(A.TODAY,'YYYY-MM-DD (DY)','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') toDate FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')-1 AS SUNDAY, TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')+5 AS SATURDAY, TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS TODAY FROM DUAL ) A
